# subtitle

**Instance Property**

The string containing the annotation’s subtitle.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var subtitle: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the string the annotation displays in the callout for the annotation view.

## Title attributes

- **title**: The string containing the annotation’s title.

items.description: The string containing the annotation’s title.
items.name: title

title: subtitle
